title: 47.18 "CORPORATION"; "AGENCY."
text: For the purpose of this section and section 47.19, the term "corporation" shall be construed to mean any bank, savings bank, trust company, insurance company, or savings association organized under the laws of this state; and the term "agency" shall be construed to mean the federal home loan bank of the district of which this state is a part, or of an adjoining district if convenience shall so require, or other financial corporation, association or agency created by any act of Congress.
